an7.68:1.1: “Sattahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti …pe… anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassa.
an7.68:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammaññū ca hoti atthaññū ca attaññū ca mattaññū ca kālaññū ca parisaññū ca puggalaparoparaññū ca.
an7.68:2.3: suttaṁ geyyaṁ veyyākaraṇaṁ gāthaṁ udānaṁ itivuttakaṁ jātakaṁ abbhutadhammaṁ vedallaṁ.
an7.68:2.4: No ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammaṁ jāneyya—
an7.68:2.5: suttaṁ geyyaṁ …pe… abbhutadhammaṁ vedallaṁ, nayidha ‘dhammaññū’ti vucceyya.
an7.68:2.6: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammaṁ jānāti—
an7.68:2.7: suttaṁ geyyaṁ …pe… abbhutadhammaṁ vedallaṁ, tasmā ‘dhammaññū’ti vuccati.
an7.68:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tassa tasseva bhāsitassa atthaṁ jānāti:
an7.68:3.3: ‘ayaṁ imassa bhāsitassa attho, ayaṁ imassa bhāsitassa attho’ti.
an7.68:3.4: No ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tassa tasseva bhāsitassa atthaṁ jāneyya:
an7.68:3.5: ‘ayaṁ imassa bhāsitassa attho, ayaṁ imassa bhāsitassa attho’ti, nayidha ‘atthaññū’ti vucceyya.
an7.68:3.6: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tassa tasseva bhāsitassa atthaṁ jānāti:
an7.68:3.7: ‘ayaṁ imassa bhāsitassa attho, ayaṁ imassa bhāsitassa attho’ti, tasmā ‘atthaññū’ti vuccati.
an7.68:4.3: ‘ettakomhi saddhāya sīlena sutena cāgena paññāya paṭibhānenā’ti.
an7.68:4.4: No ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu attānaṁ jāneyya:
an7.68:4.5: ‘ettakomhi saddhāya sīlena sutena cāgena paññāya paṭibhānenā’ti, nayidha ‘attaññū’ti vucceyya.
an7.68:4.6: Yasmā ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu attānaṁ jānāti:
an7.68:4.7: ‘ettakomhi saddhāya sīlena sutena cāgena paññāya paṭibhānenā’ti, tasmā ‘attaññū’ti vuccati.
an7.68:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mattaṁ jānāti cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānaṁ paṭiggahaṇāya.
an7.68:5.3: No ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mattaṁ jāneyya cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānaṁ paṭiggahaṇāya, nayidha ‘mattaññū’ti vucceyya.
an7.68:5.4: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mattaṁ jānāti cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānaṁ paṭiggahaṇāya, tasmā ‘mattaññū’ti vuccati.
an7.68:6.3: ‘ayaṁ kālo uddesassa, ayaṁ kālo paripucchāya, ayaṁ kālo yogassa, ayaṁ kālo paṭisallānassā’ti.
an7.68:6.4: No ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kālaṁ jāneyya:
an7.68:6.5: ‘ayaṁ kālo uddesassa, ayaṁ kālo paripucchāya, ayaṁ kālo yogassa, ayaṁ kālo paṭisallānassā’ti, nayidha ‘kālaññū’ti vucceyya.
an7.68:6.6: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kālaṁ jānāti:
an7.68:6.7: ‘ayaṁ kālo uddesassa, ayaṁ kālo paripucchāya, ayaṁ kālo yogassa, ayaṁ kālo paṭisallānassā’ti, tasmā ‘kālaññū’ti vuccati.
an7.68:6.8: Iti dhammaññū, atthaññū, attaññū, mattaññū, kālaññū.
an7.68:7.3: ‘ayaṁ khattiyaparisā, ayaṁ brāhmaṇaparisā, ayaṁ gahapatiparisā, ayaṁ samaṇaparisā.
an7.68:7.4: Tattha evaṁ upasaṅkamitabbaṁ, evaṁ ṭhātabbaṁ, evaṁ kattabbaṁ, evaṁ nisīditabbaṁ, evaṁ bhāsitabbaṁ, evaṁ tuṇhī bhavitabban’ti.
an7.68:7.5: No ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu parisaṁ jāneyya:
an7.68:7.8: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu parisaṁ jānāti:
an7.68:7.9: ‘ayaṁ khattiyaparisā, ayaṁ brāhmaṇaparisā, ayaṁ gahapatiparisā, ayaṁ samaṇaparisā.
an7.68:7.10: Tattha evaṁ upasaṅkamitabbaṁ, evaṁ ṭhātabbaṁ, evaṁ kattabbaṁ, evaṁ nisīditabbaṁ, evaṁ bhāsitabbaṁ, evaṁ tuṇhī bhavitabban’ti, tasmā ‘parisaññū’ti vuccati.
an7.68:7.11: Iti dhammaññū, atthaññū, attaññū, mattaññū, kālaññū, parisaññū.
an7.68:8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno dvayena puggalā viditā honti.
an7.68:8.4: eko ariyānaṁ dassanakāmo, eko ariyānaṁ na dassanakāmo.
an7.68:9.2: eko saddhammaṁ sotukāmo, eko saddhammaṁ na sotukāmo.
an7.68:10.2: eko ohitasoto dhammaṁ suṇāti, eko anohitasoto dhammaṁ suṇāti.
an7.68:11.2: eko sutvā dhammaṁ dhāreti, eko sutvā dhammaṁ na dhāreti.
an7.68:11.3: Yvāyaṁ puggalo sutvā na dhammaṁ dhāreti,
an7.68:12.2: eko dhātānaṁ dhammānaṁ atthaṁ upaparikkhati, eko dhātānaṁ dhammānaṁ atthaṁ na upaparikkhati.
an7.68:12.3: Yvāyaṁ puggalo dhātānaṁ dhammānaṁ atthaṁ na upaparikkhati,
an7.68:12.5: Yvāyaṁ puggalo dhātānaṁ dhammānaṁ atthaṁ upaparikkhati,
an7.68:13.1: Dve puggalā dhātānaṁ dhammānaṁ atthaṁ upaparikkhanti—
an7.68:13.2: eko atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno, eko atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya na dhammānudhammappaṭipanno.
an7.68:13.3: Yvāyaṁ puggalo atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya na dhammānudhammappaṭipanno,
an7.68:14.2: eko attahitāya paṭipanno no parahitāya, eko attahitāya ca paṭipanno parahitāya ca.
an7.68:14.3: Yvāyaṁ puggalo attahitāya paṭipanno no parahitāya,
an7.68:14.5: Yvāyaṁ puggalo attahitāya ca paṭipanno parahitāya ca,
an7.68:15.1: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno dvayena puggalā viditā honti.
an7.68:16.2: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, sattahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti pāhuneyyo …pe… anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassā”ti.
